subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: Uribe missed earlier rounds of the postseason because of a chest injury, but his pinch-hit in the sixth inning helped spur the Mets’ victory in Game 3 of the World Series on Friday.
snippet: Uribe missed earlier rounds of the postseason because of a chest injury, but his pinch-hit in the sixth inning helped spur the Mets’ victory in Game 3 of the World Series on Friday.
